Texts.Chs: 希望你没有使用admin指令，因为这样实在太无趣了，是吧？相比起来，逐步探索更有趣。
Texts.Eng: Bonus points if you didn't open up the mod and cheat...but I know not too many people do that, right? It's much more fun to explore like this.

Texts.Chs: 他通常把我藏在难以发现的地方，我只藏在某个地城内。
Texts.Eng: He usually hides me in places that're way hard to find! I don't appear in all dungeons, but I am in this one!

Texts.Chs: 你好，我的名字是Svetlana_Twofeather，另外，你也可以称我为观察者。
Texts.Eng: Hello! My name is Svetlana Twofeather. I'm The Observer's main character, so to speak.
Oh hey, you managed to find me!

Texts.Chs: 休息一下再继续你的旅程吧！我有一些物品，或许可以让你更方便地探索这个世界，最后希望你再次游玩地城。
Texts.Eng: Take a moment to rest up before you continue with your adventure! I have some supplies you might find handy, and thank you for playing Extra Dungeons again!

Texts.Chs: 你设法找到了我隐藏起来的所有秘密，你做得真棒！
Texts.Eng: That you managed to find me shows your dedication towards finding all the little secrets he's hidden in his work, and I commend you for taking the time to search every nook and cranny of his dungeons!
